intro: Stenostomum orbiculare, commonly known as the orbiculate stenostomum, is a small, herbaceous plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically features small, rounded leaves and produces daisy-like flowers with yellow centers and white petals. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in shaded or semi-shaded environments. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens and greenhouses.
